heading: words of mouth
subheading: something to chew on over the weekend: a new survey finds that president clinton is not alone. most college students don't believe that engaging in oral sex means they've "done it." in a survey of college kids by the kinsey institute, 60 percent did not equate oral-genital contact with having had sex. maybe america's public education system is worse off than we thought.
author: wired staff
text: something to chew on over the weekend: a new survey finds that president clinton is not alone. most college students don't believe that engaging in oral sex means they've "done it." in a survey of college kids by the kinsey institute, 60 percent did not equate oral-genital contact with having had sex. maybe america's public education system is worse off than we thought.
